articles.title: Europe’s leading tour company could quit the London Stock Exchange - CNN
articles.description: Tui, one of the world’s largest tour operators, is weighing whether to leave the London Stock Exchange in what would be another blow to the city’s standing as a global financial center.

articles.title: No health without brain health - The Parliament Magazine
articles.description: Whilst an estimated 179 million Europeans live with brain conditions, brain disorders still lack the awareness and recognition in the EU
articles.content:
The human brain is an incredibly complex organ, acting as the control centre of our body, in charge of even the smallest function within our bodies.
